fields.name: HTTPHeaders
fields.description: Custom headers to set in the request. HTTP allows repeated headers.

fields.name: Host
fields.description: Host name to connect to, defaults to the pod IP. You probably want to set "Host" in httpHeaders instead.

fields.name: Path
fields.description: Path to access on the HTTP server.

fields.name: Port
fields.description: Name or number of the port to access on the container. Number must be in the range 1 to 65535. Name must be an IANA_SVC_NAME.

fields.name: Scheme
fields.description: Scheme to use for connecting to the host. Defaults to HTTP.
